name: RL Metaverse
description:
To celebrate our love for the written word.

"The real metaverse is the imaginary world that we enter when we read, empathize, and then recognize in our daily lives some scrap of the shared experience that literature gives us" —Niall Ferguson

4096px X 4096px png by @natlarrode.
